name: Northern Skies - A stargazing story
description:
This is a short visual novel with some interactive stargazing. It is fully playable and demonstrates the concept, but it is as of yet not entirely finished. Still, have fun and please leave some feedback!

[Press space to continue the story]

Made for the LOWREZJAM 2021.

Thanks to CaliberMengsk for the Unity Lowrez starter package :)
